member.name: M:System.IO.BinaryReaderExtensions.Align(System.IO.BinaryReader,System.Int64)
member.summary: Aligns the cursor's current position to the specified byte-alignment
member.param: The byte-alignment to calculate (e.x. 1024)

member.name: T:DSCript.Block
member.summary: Represents the base class for chunks/chunk data

member.name: P:DSCript.Block.ID
member.summary: Gets or sets the zero-based ID of this block.

member.name: P:DSCript.Block.Magic
member.summary: Gets or sets the magic number of this block.

member.name: P:DSCript.Block.Parent
member.summary: Gets or sets the parent of this block.

member.name: P:DSCript.Block.BaseOffset
member.summary: Gets the calculated base offset of this block.

member.name: P:DSCript.Block.Offset
member.summary: Gets or sets the offset to this block. This is usually relative to the parent (if it has one) - otherwise, it should be zero.

member.name: P:DSCript.Block.Size
member.summary: Gets or sets the size of this block. This should represent all data contained, depending on the .

member.name: P:DSCript.Block.BlockType
member.summary: Gets the for this block.

member.name: T:DSCript.ChunkBlock
member.summary: A class that represents a spooling-based data format, used to store data of various formats in Reflections games.

member.name: M:DSCript.ChunkBlock.CalculateOffsets
member.summary: Calculate's the offsets for each entry.

member.name: M:DSCript.ChunkBlock.CalculateSize
member.summary: Calculates the overall size of this chunk.
member.returns: The computed size of this chunk.

member.name: M:DSCript.ChunkBlock.#ctor(System.Int32,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Creates a new with the specified id and offset. Since no parent is defined, this should be used for root chunks only.
member.param: The zero-based id used to identify this chunk.
The absolute offset to this chunk.

member.name: M:DSCript.ChunkBlock.#ctor(System.Int32,System.UInt32,DSCript.ChunkEntry)
member.summary: Creates a new with the specified id, offset, and parent. The parent-child relationship allows for this chunk to be included in size calculations that are initiated from the parent.
member.param: The zero-based id used to identify this chunk.
The relative offset to this chunk.
The parent of this chunk.

member.name: P:DSCript.ChunkBlock.Entries
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of block entries in this chunk.

member.name: P:DSCript.ChunkBlock.Magic
member.summary: Gets the magic number for this chunk.

member.name: P:DSCript.ChunkBlock.Parent
member.summary: Gets or sets the parent of this chunk.

member.name: P:DSCript.ChunkBlock.HasParent
member.summary: Gets a value representing whether or not this chunk has a parent.

member.name: P:DSCript.ChunkBlock.Size
member.summary: Gets the computed size of this chunk.

member.name: P:DSCript.ChunkBlock.HeaderSize
member.summary: Gets the computed size of the header.

member.name: M:DSCript.BlockEditor.Commit
member.summary: Commits all changes made to the buffer and applies them to the Block's data.

member.name: P:DSCript.BlockEditor.BlockData
member.summary: The block data currently being edited by this

member.name: P:DSCript.BlockEditor.Stream
member.summary: The memory stream representing the buffer.

member.name: P:DSCript.BlockEditor.Reader
member.summary: A based off of the memory stream representing the buffer.

member.name: P:DSCript.BlockEditor.Writer
member.summary: A based off of the memory stream representing the buffer.

member.name: M:System.Drawing.BitmapExtensions.ToBitmapSource(System.Drawing.Bitmap)
member.summary: Converts a into a WPF .
member.remarks: Uses GDI to do the conversion. Hence the call to the marshalled DeleteObject.
member.param: The source bitmap.

member.name: M:System.StringExtensions.SplitColumn(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Formats a delimited string using the "|" character into a split column with the specified distance.
member.param: The delimited string that contains a "|" delimiter which defines where the split column should be.
The column where everything after the delimiter should go.

member.name: M:System.Text.StringBuilderExtensions.AppendFormat2(System.Text.StringBuilder,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: This extension method forces the 'en-US' culture while formatting lines. See the default AppendFormat for more info.
member.param: A composite format string
An array of objects to format.

member.name: M:System.Text.StringBuilderExtensions.AppendLines(System.Text.StringBuilder,System.Int32)
member.summary: Appends a definitive amount of new lines to the end of the current object.
member.param: Number of lines to be inserted

member.name: T:System.IO.INIFile
member.summary: Represents a class used to read/write key values to/from INI files.

member.name: M:System.IO.INIFile.ReadValue(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Reads a key value from the specified section.
member.param: The section to retrieve the key value from.
The key value to retrieve.
member.returns: The key value from the specified section, otherwise returns a blank string.

member.name: M:System.IO.INIFile.WriteValue(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Writes a key value to the specified section.
member.param: The section to write the key value to.
The key to write to.
The value to write.
member.returns: True if successful, False if the operation failed.

member.name: F:DSCript.Chunk.Magic
member.summary: The magic number of a Chunk (CHNK).

member.summary: The supported version for loading Chunk files (Version 3).

member.name: F:DSCript.Chunk.FilePadding
member.summary: Defines the amount of padding between each non-root Chunk block. A default value of 4096 is used. Use caution when changing the value, as this may crash the game!

member.name: M:DSCript.Chunk.GetByteAlignment(System.UInt32,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Returns an unsigned integer representing the number of bytes to be inserted for proper byte-aligned padding.
member.param: The offset that will be used to calculate byte-aligned padding
How much padding should be applied
member.returns: The number of bytes that should be inserted for proper byte-aligned padding

member.name: M:DSCript.Chunk.GetByteAlignment(System.UInt32,DSCript.Chunk.ByteAlignment)
member.summary: Returns an unsigned integer representing the number of bytes to be inserted for proper byte-aligned padding. This method uses an enumeration to define byte-alignment for common values. See each options documentation for more information.
member.param: The offset that will be used to calculate byte-aligned padding
How much padding should be applied
member.returns: The number of bytes that should be inserted for proper byte-aligned padding

member.name: M:DSCript.Chunk.ByteAlign(System.UInt32,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Returns an unsigned integer representing an offset that has been byte-aligned with a given value.
member.param: The offset that will be used to calculate byte-aligned padding
How much padding should be applied

member.name: M:DSCript.Chunk.ByteAlign(System.UInt32,DSCript.Chunk.ByteAlignment)
member.summary: Returns an unsigned integer representing an offset that has been byte-aligned with a given value. /// This method uses an enumeration to define byte-alignment for common values. See each options documentation for more information.
member.param: The offset that will be used to calculate byte-aligned padding
How much padding should be applied

member.name: F:DSCript.Chunk.BytePaddingType.PaddingType1
member.summary: Specifies the padding type used in DRIV3R (0xDECO15A1)

member.name: F:DSCript.Chunk.BytePaddingType.PaddingType2
member.summary: Specifies the padding type used in Driver: Parallel Lines and Driver: San Francisco (0x3E)

member.name: F:DSCript.Chunk.BytePaddingType.Custom
member.summary: Specifies a custom padding type as defined in .

member.name: T:DSCript.Chunk.ByteAlignment
member.summary: An enumeration with common values used to calculate byte-alignment.

member.name: F:DSCript.Chunk.ByteAlignment.ByteAlign16
member.summary: Aligns data to 16-bytes (e.g. 0x384 > 0x390)

member.name: F:DSCript.Chunk.ByteAlignment.ByteAlign32
member.summary: Aligns data to 32-bytes (e.g. 0x384 > 0x3A0)

member.name: F:DSCript.Chunk.ByteAlignment.ByteAlign512
member.summary: Aligns data to 512-bytes (e.g. 0x384 > 0x400)

member.name: F:DSCript.Chunk.ByteAlignment.ByteAlign4096
member.summary: Aligns data to 4096-bytes (e.g. 0x384 > 0x1000)

member.name: T:DSCript.Models.FVFType
member.summary: An enumeration defining different types of vertices used in DRIV3R/Driver: Parallel Lines.

member.name: F:DSCript.Models.FVFType.Vertex12
member.summary: Contains data for Position, Normals, Mapping, and Specular.

member.name: F:DSCript.Models.FVFType.Vertex15
member.summary: Contains data for Position, Normals, Mapping, Blend Weights, and Specular.

member.name: F:DSCript.Models.FVFType.Vertex16
member.summary: Contains data for Position, Normals, Mapping, Blend Weights, Specular, and Unknown.

member.name: F:DSCript.Models.FVFType.Unknown
member.summary: Represents an unknown type.

member.name: M:DSCript.Models.TextureCache.GetCachedTexture(DSCript.Models.CacheableTexture)
member.summary: Retrieves a cached version of this texture (if it exists), otherwise it will be added to the cache automatically.
member.param: The texture to get a cached version of
member.returns: The cached version of the texture

member.name: T:DSCript.Models.D3DPRIMITIVETYPE
member.summary: Defines the primitives supported by Direct3D. Source: http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/bb172589%28v=vs.85%29.aspx

member.name: F:DSCript.Models.D3DPRIMITIVETYPE.D3DPT_POINTLIST
member.summary: Renders the vertices as a collection of isolated points. This value is unsupported for indexed primitives.

member.name: F:DSCript.Models.D3DPRIMITIVETYPE.D3DPT_LINELIST
member.summary: Renders the vertices as a list of isolated straight line segments.

member.name: F:DSCript.Models.D3DPRIMITIVETYPE.D3DPT_LINESTRIP
member.summary: Renders the vertices as a single polyline.

member.name: F:DSCript.Models.D3DPRIMITIVETYPE.D3DPT_TRIANGLELIST
member.summary:
Renders the specified vertices as a sequence of isolated triangles. Each group of three vertices defines a separate triangle.
Back-face culling is affected by the current winding-order render state.

member.name: F:DSCript.Models.D3DPRIMITIVETYPE.D3DPT_TRIANGLESTRIP
member.summary: Renders the vertices as a triangle strip. The backface-culling flag is automatically flipped on even-numbered triangles.

member.name: F:DSCript.Models.D3DPRIMITIVETYPE.D3DPT_TRIANGLEFAN
member.summary: Renders the vertices as a triangle fan.

member.name: F:DSCript.Models.D3DPRIMITIVETYPE.D3DPT_FORCE_DWORD
member.summary: Forces this enumeration to compile to 32 bits in size. Without this value, some compilers would allow this enumeration to compile to a size other than 32 bits. This value is not used.

member.name: T:DSCript.Models.IndexedMesh
member.summary:
IDirect3DDevice9::DrawIndexedPrimitive -- Based on indexing, renders the specified geometric primitive into an array of vertices.
Source: http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/bb174369%28v=vs.85%29.aspx

member.name: P:DSCript.Models.IndexedMesh.ModelPackage
member.summary: The this mesh belongs to.

member.name: P:DSCript.Models.IndexedMesh.PartsGroup
member.summary: The this mesh belongs to.

member.name: P:DSCript.Models.IndexedMesh.MeshGroup
member.summary: The this mesh belongs to.

member.name: P:DSCript.Models.IndexedMesh.PrimitiveType
member.summary: Member of the enumerated type, describing the type of primitive to render. D3DPT_POINTLIST is not supported with this method.

member.name: P:DSCript.Models.IndexedMesh.BaseVertexIndex
member.summary: Offset from the start of the vertex buffer to the first vertex.

member.name: P:DSCript.Models.IndexedMesh.MinIndex
member.summary: Minimum vertex index for vertices used during this call. This is a zero based index relative to BaseVertexIndex.

member.name: P:DSCript.Models.IndexedMesh.NumVertices
member.summary: Number of vertices used during this call. The first vertex is located at index: BaseVertexIndex + MinIndex.

member.name: P:DSCript.Models.IndexedMesh.StartIndex
member.summary: Index of the first index to use when accessing the vertex buffer. Beginning at StartIndex to index vertices from the vertex buffer.

member.name: P:DSCript.Models.IndexedMesh.PrimitiveCount
member.summary: Number of primitives to render. The number of vertices used is a function of the primitive count and the primitive type.

member.name: P:DSCript.Models.IndexedMesh.MaterialId
member.summary: The material used for this mesh.

member.name: P:DSCript.Models.IndexedMesh.SourceUID
member.summary: The UID of the package containing the material.

member.name: P:DSCript.Models.PartsGroup.VertexBufferId
member.summary: Gets or sets the ID of the Vertex Buffer to use when accessing vertices

member.name: M:DSCript.Models.Vertex.GetBytes
member.summary: Returns the byte-array representing this in its compiled form.

member.summary: Creates a new .
member.param: The this will be based on.

member.name: M:DSCript.Models.Vertex.#ctor(DSCript.Models.Vertex,DSCript.Models.FVFType)
member.summary: Creates a new based on an existing instance.
member.param: The existing to copy values from
The vertex format used. The new vertex will reflect upon this format.

member.name: M:DSCript.Models.Vertex.#ctor(System.Byte[],DSCript.Models.FVFType)
member.summary: Creates a new based on a buffer.
member.param: The bytes from a vertex buffer
The vertex format used to read the buffer.

member.name: P:DSCript.Models.Vertex.Position
member.summary: Gets or sets the position of the vertex.

member.name: P:DSCript.Models.Vertex.Normal
member.summary: Gets or sets the normals of the vertex.

member.name: P:DSCript.Models.Vertex.UV
member.summary: Gets or sets the UV mapping of the vertex.

member.name: P:DSCript.Models.Vertex.Diffuse
member.summary: Gets or sets the RGBA diffuse color of the vertex.

member.name: P:DSCript.Models.Vertex.BlendWeights
member.summary: Gets or sets the blending weights of the vertex. This field is only used with certain VertexType's, and is ignored otherwise.

member.name: P:DSCript.Models.Vertex.Unknown
member.summary: Gets or sets the unknown value of the vertex. This field is only used with certain VertexType's, and is ignored otherwise.

member.name: M:DSCript.Models.VertexData.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new vertex buffer used for storing vertices.
member.param: The number of vertices in the buffer.
The length of each in the buffer. This should be based on an existing .

member.name: P:DSCript.Models.VertexData.Length
member.summary: Gets the length of each entry.

member.name: P:DSCript.Models.VertexData.Buffer
member.summary: Gets or sets the buffer.

member.name: P:DSCript.Models.VertexData.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets or sets the at the specified index.
member.param: The index into the buffer.
member.returns: The vertex at the specified index in the buffer.

member.name: P:DSCript.Models.VertexData.VertexType
